author: djh
msg: Fix gettext initialization issues on Win32 pointed out by
Brane.
* svn_private_config.hw
Add define for SVN_LOCALE_RELATIVE_PATH.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/cmdline.c
(svn_cmdline_init): Tweak Win32 gettext initialization
to use unicode version of the GetModuleFileName api and
convert it to utf8 for internal handling.

author: dlr
msg: Improve location of the jikes Java compiler by allowing for a
--with-jikes=[PATH|yes|no] argument to configure.
* build/ac-macros/java.m4
(SVN_FIND_JDK): Piggybacking on r9414, allow for a
--with-jikes=[PATH|yes|no] argument to configure.  Jikes is looked
for by default, but extra verification steps are taken when it's
requested explicitly.  This search can be turned off by explicitly
specifying 'no' as the value for the new configure param.
* subversion/bindings/java/README
(BUILDING): New section mentioning --with-maintainer-mode and
--with-jikes configure flags.

author: dlr
msg: Enable dynamic location of the jikes Java compiler, which is preferred
for its superior compilation speed (when available).  The actual tests
used for the location of its binary could use some improvement, as
they simply check a few likely, static locations.
* Makefile.in
(swig_java_api_CLASSPATH, swig_java_java_CLASSPATH): Build target
specific classpaths.
* configure.in
Noted that SVN_CHECK_JDK will set the CLASSPATH env var.  Because of
this fact, no longer explicily unset JAVA_CLASSPATH later on before
possibly modifying the CLASSPATH (if --with-junit is passed to
configure).
* build/ac-macros/java.m4
Prefer jikes, if it can be located.  Set the CLASSPATH to include
the libraries needed for a usable JRE.

author: djh
msg: Add a note about building with gettext support on Win32.
* INSTALL
(II.E): Note the --enable-nls option for Win32 builds.

author: dlr
msg: * build/generator/gen_make.py
(Generator.write): Remove the TODO of having
--enable-maintainer-mode add the -g argument to include all
debugging info in compiled bytecodes.  It was implemented in
